availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Henry Sidle (Pike County, Missouri, farmer)

body.p: Pike County, Missouri, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of George Sidle. Married to Elizabeth Jane Lowry on January 14, 1860, in Pike County, Missouri. Father of Ann M. Sidle and James Homer Sidle. Mentioned in November 8, 1863, correspondence between R. B. Carpenter and Gov. Thomas E. Bramlette regarding the murder of Richard Jameson by his father, George.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 143A.
